verses.verse: And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H7851>Shittim<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>:

for they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%>, and bowed <S%H7812>down<s%> to their <S%H430>gods<s%>.
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6775>joined<s%> himself unto <S%H1187>Baal-peor<s%>: and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> all the <S%H7218>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and hang them <S%H3363>up<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, that the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> may turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H2026>Slay<s%> ye <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H582>men<s%> that have <S%H6775>joined<s%> themselves unto <S%H1187>Baal-peor<s%>.

And <S%H376><s%>, behold, one of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%> a Midianitish <S%H4084>woman<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, while they were <S%H1058>weeping<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And when <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H6965>it<s%>, he rose up from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H7420>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

and he <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H6898>pavilion<s%>, and <S%H1856>thrust<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H376>through<s%>, the man of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H413>through<s%> her <S%H6897>body<s%>. So the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And those that <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H4046>plague<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

Phinehas <S%H6372><s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, hath <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, in that he was <S%H7065>jealous<s%> with my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3615>them<s%>, so that I consumed not the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>.
Wherefore <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I give unto him my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>:

and it shall be unto <S%H2233>him<s%>, and to his seed <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1285>him<s%>, the covenant of an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>; <S%H834>because<s%> he was <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for his <S%H430>God<s%>, and made <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the man of <S%H376>Israel<s%> that was <S%H5221>slain<s%>, who was <S%H5221>slain<s%> with the Midianitish <S%H4084>woman<s%>, was <S%H2174>Zimri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5543>Salu<s%>, a <S%H5387>prince<s%> of a <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> among the <S%H8099>Simeonites<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4084>Midianitish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> that was <S%H5221>slain<s%> was <S%H3579>Cozbi<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6698>Zur<s%>; he was <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H523>people<s%> of a <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.

for they <S%H6887>vex<s%> you with their <S%H5231>wiles<s%>, wherewith they have <S%H5230>beguiled<s%> you in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%>, and in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H3579>Cozbi<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, their <S%H269>sister<s%>, who was <S%H5221>slain<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H4046>plague<s%> in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%>.
